• Welcome to Lepton!

    The cheerful Christian giving app.

  • Church

    Keep up to date with your church and its giving activities

  • Give

    Once your payment details are stored, set up donations in just a few taps

  • Giving Calculator

    Helps you work out how much to give either regularly, or as a one off gift

  • Community

    See what other people support. Optionally let others know that you gave

  • Profile

    Build your own public and private generosity profile
